Model

类 Risk_Model

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.util.Observable
      • Model.Risk_Model

  • public class Risk_Model
extends java.util.Observable
    This class is the model for the Risk program. It contains the data, methods, and functions that are required to manipulate the data of the Risk Game.
    作者:
    yaome

        set the map file path.
        参数:

        public java.lang.String getMapFilePath()

        返回:

      • setPlayerCount

        public void setPlayerCount(int playerCount)
        Sets the number of players.
        参数:
        playerCount - is an integer input by the player in the PlayerCount GUI.

      • getPlayerCount

        public int getPlayerCount()
        Gets the number of players.
        返回:
        the number of players in the Risk game.

      • initializeGame

        public boolean initializeGame(java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> playerNames)
                       throws java.io.FileNotFoundException
        Sets up the Risk game.
        参数:
        playerNames - is an ArrayList of the player names.
        返回:
        true if the game was successfully initialized
        抛出:
        java.io.FileNotFoundException - the file not found exception

      • startGame

        public void startGame()
        Starts the game and prints out welcome messages.

      • turnInCards

        public void turnInCards(int[] cardsToRemove)
        Handles turning in Risk cards.
        参数:
        cardsToRemove - is an integer array of the indexes of cards to be removed.

      • reinforce

        public void reinforce(java.lang.String countryAName)
        Handles placing reinforcements.
        参数:
        countryAName - is a String of the country in which the reinforcements will be placed

      • attack

        public void attack(java.lang.String countryAName,
                   java.lang.String countryBName)
        Handles the attack function. Attacking allows the player to engage in battles, with outcomes decided by RNG, with opposing players in order to lower the number of armies in a territory to 0 in order to occupy it.
        参数:
        countryAName - the country A name
        countryBName - the country B name

      • skipAttack

        public void skipAttack()
        Skip attack.

      • fortify

        public void fortify(java.lang.String countryAName,
                    java.lang.String countryBName)
        Handles the fortify function. Fortifying allows the player to move armies from one country to another occupied country once per turn.
        参数:
        countryAName - the country A name
        countryBName - the country B name

      • nextPlayer

        public void nextPlayer()
        Handles turn transitions in both the deploy phase and game phase.

      • getCardsList

        public java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> getCardsList()
        Creates and returns the information for the cardsList in the BoardView.
        返回:
        a list of Strings to be displayed in the cardsList.
